verses.text_plain: Moreover the word of the Lord came unto me, saying,
verses.verse_html: 1Moreover the word of the Lord came unto me, saying,

verses.text_plain: Now, thou son of man, wilt thou judge, wilt thou judge the bloody city? yea, thou shalt shew her all her abominations.
verses.verse_html:
2Now, thou son of man, wilt thou judge, wilt thou judge the bloody city? yea, thou shalt shew her all her abominations. ▼
▼ judge: or, plead for
 , ▼
▼ bloody…: Heb. city of bloods?
 , ▼
▼ shew her: Heb. make her know

footnotes.body_html: ▼ judge: or, plead for
▼ bloody…: Heb. city of bloods?

footnotes.body_text: ▼ shew her: Heb. make her know
footnotes.body_html: ▼ shew her: Heb. make her know

verses.text_plain: Then say thou, Thus saith the Lord God, The city sheddeth blood in the midst of it, that her time may come, and maketh idols against herself to defile herself.
verses.verse_html: 3Then say thou, Thus saith the Lord God, The city sheddeth blood in the midst of it, that her time may come, and maketh idols against herself to defile herself.

verses.text_plain: Thou art become guilty in thy blood that thou hast shed; and hast defiled thyself in thine idols which thou hast made; and thou hast caused thy days to draw near, and art come even unto thy years: therefore have I made thee a reproach unto the heathen, and a mocking to all countries.
verses.verse_html: 4Thou art become guilty in thy blood that thou hast shed; and hast defiled thyself in thine idols which thou hast made; and thou hast caused thy days to draw near, and art come even unto thy years: therefore have I made thee a reproach unto the heathen, and a mocking to all countries.

tokens.text: and thou hast caused thy days

verses.text_plain: Those that be near, and those that be far from thee, shall mock thee, which art infamous and much vexed.
verses.verse_html:
5Those that be near, and those that be far from thee, shall mock thee, which art infamous and much vexed. ▼
▼ infamous…: Heb. polluted of name, much in vexation

footnotes.body_text: ▼ infamous…: Heb. polluted of name, much in vexation
footnotes.body_html: ▼ infamous…: Heb. polluted of name, much in vexation

verses.text_plain: Behold, the princes of Israel, every one were in thee to their power to shed blood.
verses.verse_html:
6Behold, the princes of Israel, every one were in thee to their power to shed blood. ▼
▼ power: Heb. arm

tokens.text: were in thee to their power

verses.text_plain: In thee have they set light by father and mother: in the midst of thee have they dealt by oppression with the stranger: in thee have they vexed the fatherless and the widow.
verses.verse_html:
7In thee have they set light by father and mother: in the midst of thee have they dealt by oppression with the stranger: in thee have they vexed the fatherless and the widow. ▼
▼ oppression: or, deceit

tokens.text: In thee have they set light

verses.text_plain: Thou hast despised mine holy things, and hast profaned my sabbaths.
verses.verse_html: 8Thou hast despised mine holy things, and hast profaned my sabbaths.

verses.text_plain: In thee are men that carry tales to shed blood: and in thee they eat upon the mountains: in the midst of thee they commit lewdness.
verses.verse_html:
9In thee are men that carry tales to shed blood: and in thee they eat upon the mountains: in the midst of thee they commit lewdness. ▼
▼ that…: Heb. of slanders

footnotes.body_html: ▼ that…: Heb. of slanders

verses.text_plain: In thee have they discovered their fathers’ nakedness: in thee have they humbled her that was set apart for pollution.
verses.verse_html: 10In thee have they discovered their fathers’ nakedness: in thee have they humbled her that was set apart for pollution.

verses.text_plain: And one hath committed abomination with his neighbour’s wife; and another hath lewdly defiled his daughter in law; and another in thee hath humbled his sister, his father’s daughter.
verses.verse_html:
11And one hath committed abomination with his neighbour’s wife; and another hath lewdly defiled his daughter in law; and another in thee hath humbled his sister, his father’s daughter. ▼
▼ one: or, every one
 , ▼
▼ another: or, every one
 , ▼
▼ lewdly: or, by lewdness

footnotes.body_html: ▼ one: or, every one
▼ another: or, every one
▼ lewdly: or, by lewdness

verses.text_plain: In thee have they taken gifts to shed blood; thou hast taken usury and increase, and thou hast greedily gained of thy neighbours by extortion, and hast forgotten me, saith the Lord God.
verses.verse_html: 12In thee have they taken gifts to shed blood; thou hast taken usury and increase, and thou hast greedily gained of thy neighbours by extortion, and hast forgotten me, saith the Lord God.

verses.text_plain: Behold, therefore I have smitten mine hand at thy dishonest gain which thou hast made, and at thy blood which hath been in the midst of thee.
verses.verse_html: 13Behold, therefore I have smitten mine hand at thy dishonest gain which thou hast made, and at thy blood which hath been in the midst of thee.

tokens.text: which hath been in the midst

verses.text_plain: Can thine heart endure, or can thine hands be strong, in the days that I shall deal with thee? I the Lord have spoken it, and will do it.
verses.verse_html: 14Can thine heart endure, or can thine hands be strong, in the days that I shall deal with thee? I the Lord have spoken it, and will do it.

verses.text_plain: And I will scatter thee among the heathen, and disperse thee in the countries, and will consume thy filthiness out of thee.
verses.verse_html: 15And I will scatter thee among the heathen, and disperse thee in the countries, and will consume thy filthiness out of thee.

verses.text_plain: And thou shalt take thine inheritance in thyself in the sight of the heathen, and thou shalt know that I am the Lord.
verses.verse_html:
16And thou shalt take thine inheritance in thyself in the sight of the heathen, and thou shalt know that I am the Lord. ▼
▼ shalt take…: or, shalt be profaned

tokens.text: And thou shalt take thine inheritance

footnotes.body_text: ▼ shalt take…: or, shalt be profaned
footnotes.body_html: ▼ shalt take…: or, shalt be profaned

verses.text_plain: And the word of the Lord came unto me, saying,
verses.verse_html: 17And the word of the Lord came unto me, saying,

verses.text_plain: Son of man, the house of Israel is to me become dross: all they are brass, and tin, and iron, and lead, in the midst of the furnace; they are even the dross of silver.
verses.verse_html:
18Son of man, the house of Israel is to me become dross: all they are brass, and tin, and iron, and lead, in the midst of the furnace; they are even the dross of silver. ▼
▼ dross of silver: Heb. drosses, etc

footnotes.body_text: ▼ dross of silver: Heb. drosses, etc
footnotes.body_html: ▼ dross of silver: Heb. drosses, etc

verses.text_plain: Therefore thus saith the Lord God; Because ye are all become dross, behold, therefore I will gather you into the midst of Jerusalem.
verses.verse_html: 19Therefore thus saith the Lord God; Because ye are all become dross, behold, therefore I will gather you into the midst of Jerusalem.

tokens.text: Because ye are all become dross

verses.text_plain: As they gather silver, and brass, and iron, and lead, and tin, into the midst of the furnace, to blow the fire upon it, to melt it; so will I gather you in mine anger and in my fury, and I will leave you there, and melt you.
verses.verse_html:
20As they gather silver, and brass, and iron, and lead, and tin, into the midst of the furnace, to blow the fire upon it, to melt it; so will I gather you in mine anger and in my fury, and I will leave you there, and melt you. ▼
▼ As…: Heb. According to the gathering

footnotes.body_text: ▼ As…: Heb. According to the gathering
footnotes.body_html: ▼ As…: Heb. According to the gathering

verses.text_plain: Yea, I will gather you, and blow upon you in the fire of my wrath, and ye shall be melted in the midst thereof.
verses.verse_html: 21Yea, I will gather you, and blow upon you in the fire of my wrath, and ye shall be melted in the midst thereof.

verses.text_plain: As silver is melted in the midst of the furnace, so shall ye be melted in the midst thereof; and ye shall know that I the Lord have poured out my fury upon you.
verses.verse_html: 22As silver is melted in the midst of the furnace, so shall ye be melted in the midst thereof; and ye shall know that I the Lord have poured out my fury upon you.

verses.text_plain: And the word of the Lord came unto me, saying,
verses.verse_html: 23And the word of the Lord came unto me, saying,

verses.text_plain: Son of man, say unto her, Thou art the land that is not cleansed, nor rained upon in the day of indignation.
verses.verse_html: 24Son of man, say unto her, Thou art the land that is not cleansed, nor rained upon in the day of indignation.

verses.text_plain: There is a conspiracy of her prophets in the midst thereof, like a roaring lion ravening the prey; they have devoured souls; they have taken the treasure and precious things; they have made her many widows in the midst thereof.
verses.verse_html: 25There is a conspiracy of her prophets in the midst thereof, like a roaring lion ravening the prey; they have devoured souls; they have taken the treasure and precious things; they have made her many widows in the midst thereof.

verses.text_plain: Her priests have violated my law, and have profaned mine holy things: they have put no difference between the holy and profane, neither have they shewed difference between the unclean and the clean, and have hid their eyes from my sabbaths, and I am profaned among them.
verses.verse_html:
26Her priests have violated my law, and have profaned mine holy things: they have put no difference between the holy and profane, neither have they shewed difference between the unclean and the clean, and have hid their eyes from my sabbaths, and I am profaned among them. ▼
▼ violated: Heb. offered violence to

footnotes.body_html: ▼ violated: Heb. offered violence to

verses.text_plain: Her princes in the midst thereof are like wolves ravening the prey, to shed blood, and to destroy souls, to get dishonest gain.
verses.verse_html: 27Her princes in the midst thereof are like wolves ravening the prey, to shed blood, and to destroy souls, to get dishonest gain.

verses.text_plain: And her prophets have daubed them with untempered morter, seeing vanity, and divining lies unto them, saying, Thus saith the Lord God, when the Lord hath not spoken.
verses.verse_html: 28And her prophets have daubed them with untempered morter, seeing vanity, and divining lies unto them, saying, Thus saith the Lord God, when the Lord hath not spoken.

verses.text_plain: The people of the land have used oppression, and exercised robbery, and have vexed the poor and needy: yea, they have oppressed the stranger wrongfully.
verses.verse_html:
29The people of the land have used oppression, and exercised robbery, and have vexed the poor and needy: yea, they have oppressed the stranger wrongfully. ▼
▼ oppression: or, deceit
 , ▼
▼ wrongfully: Heb. without right

footnotes.body_html: ▼ wrongfully: Heb. without right

verses.text_plain: And I sought for a man among them, that should make up the hedge, and stand in the gap before me for the land, that I should not destroy it: but I found none.
verses.verse_html: 30And I sought for a man among them, that should make up the hedge, and stand in the gap before me for the land, that I should not destroy it: but I found none.

tokens.text: among them, that should make up

verses.text_plain: Therefore have I poured out mine indignation upon them; I have consumed them with the fire of my wrath: their own way have I recompensed upon their heads, saith the Lord God.
verses.verse_html: 31Therefore have I poured out mine indignation upon them; I have consumed them with the fire of my wrath: their own way have I recompensed upon their heads, saith the Lord God.
